snippet: With the major airlines issuing a policy statement, it’s time for their customers to publish some guidelines for the carriers.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column observes that with the major airlines issuing a policy statement, it is time for their customers to publish some guidelines for the carriers; suggests his Airline Consumer Manifesto.
lead_paragraph: With the major airlines issuing a policy statement, it’s time for their customers to publish some guidelines for the carriers.
